title: BRIEF-Momenta Pharmaceuticals Announces FDA Approval And Launch Of Glatopa
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Momenta Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* MOMENTA PHARMACEUTICALS ANNOUNCES FDA APPROVAL AND LAUNCH OF GLATOPA® (GLATIRAMER ACETATE INJECTION) 40 MG/ML
* MOMENTA PHARMACEUTICALS- U.S. FDA HAS APPROVED SANDOZ‘S ABBREVIATED NEW DRUG APPLICATION FOR GLATOPA (GLATIRAMER ACETATE INJECTION) 40 MG/ML​
* MOMENTA PHARMACEUTICALS - SANDOZ INITIATED LAUNCH OF THE PRODUCT IN U.S.
* MOMENTA PHARMACEUTICALS - GLATOPA WAS DEVELOPED UNDER A COLLABORATION AGREEMENT BETWEEN MOMENTA AND SANDOZ AND IS PRODUCED IN THE US Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom)
